title: Hi, this isn't an issue as such but more of a mystery which maybe you can solve! At the moment I don
content: Hi, this isn't an issue as such but more of a mystery which maybe you can solve! At the moment I don't have broadband, but a limited data amount which I only turn on when necessary. However, I see the phone can still identify music and songs playing on the radio! How is this possible without access to the internet? Is there a little knowledable guy in there who types that info on the screen?!!
